metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40890 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the lookup_sequence function of ZBar 0.23.90. Specially crafted QR codes may lead to information disclosure and/or arbitrary code execution. To trigger this vulnerability, an attacker can digitally input the malicious QR code, or prepare it to be physically scanned by the vulnerable scanner.

criterions.comment: zbar package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
